neg_sample_comments.comment: The sd card starts corrupting data at 32gbs.
the sandisk sd card does not work.
Around a month ago it started giving me all kinds of error, "micro sd can not be detected" and "corrupted data".
Showed a 128GB card was under 2mb.
The 200gb SD card doesnt work.

I bought 2 SD cards for my dash cam , today October 8th , 2018 I realize that ether one is working, thanks that I checked otherwise I don’t want even think get into a car accident and check my dashcam and get a surprise that SD card error.
I contacted Sandisk about the warranty that comes with every authentic Sandisk SD card, unfortunately they informed me that this is not an authentic Sandisk.
It's an sd card, nobody should have to write a review but it keeps pinging me to make one, thanks Jeff Bezos.
I wish I could have the same memory.
